name: Sira-Ren
loreDescription: This rare magical flower blooms from the corpse of a Human who possessed incredible magic power. It quickly withers away unless it is constantly being infused with powerful Mana. Few have been lucky enough to witness such a sight.

skillDescription.base: 25.0% chance to inflict a random debuff for 1 turn after attacking. (one from Decrease Attack, Decrease Hit Chance, Silence, Sleep, and Poison).
skillDescription.max: 50.0% chance to inflict a random debuff for 1 turn after attacking. (one from Decrease Attack, Decrease Hit Chance, Silence, Sleep, and Poison).
